product_name: ANUA8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser is a cream-to-foam cleanser infused with Glycerin, Panthenol and Zinc, to moisturize and hydrate the skin without leaving a stripped feeling after cleansing.
details: DetailsBenefitsEveryday, non-stripping gentle foaming cleanserFragrance-freeFree Of: Denatured Alcohols / Artificial Color / Oil / Silicones / Sulfates / ParabensKey Ingredients8 Hyaluronic acid & Glycerin: Deeply hydrates the skin without irritationZinc: Helps balance sebum production and removes all impurities effectively, including sunscreenPanthenol: Helps form a moisture barrier and encourages a healthy skin barrierResearch Results48-hour moisture retention effect (107% increase in skin hydration immediately after use compared to before use, 72% retention after 48 hours)78% improvement in sebum levels immediately after use89.07% improvement in sunscreen cleansing efficacySkin low-irritation test completedItem 2634625How To UseApply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam and gently massage your entire face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.Can be used every day, AM & PM.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Coco-Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Potassium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Zinc PCA, Decyl Glucoside, Hectorite, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Polyquaternium-67, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Maltodextrin.
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam and gently massage your entire face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.Can be used every day, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Remember-all skin is different!
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE this cleanser. I was getting tired of breakouts and wanted to try Korean skincare and came across this brand. It has done wonders for my skin. This cleanser is gentle and really gets my skin clean (I pair it with the Anua Heartleaf cleansing oil to double-cleanse my makeup off.) Just remember when reading reviews, everyone's skin is different and what works for some doesn't work for others It's important to pay attention to the ingredients and gain an understanding of what your skin will tolerate. I've had other products I've used where it worked great at first then I developed an allergic reaction after weeks of use. I love this cleanser and am glad to have found one that works well for my skin. Good luck!

reviews.headline: gave me horrible acne.. worst cleanser ever
reviews.comments: i've had this cleanser for about 2 months now, and at first when i starting using it, my skin started growing acne on my forehead and cheeks. i thought it was just hormonal acne or that i was just purging from using a new product. i kept using it and my skin would just get WORSE. a new pimple would grow on my face every day, and it would be so painful. i've never had such horrible acne until i used this product. i continuously used it for a month and the only results i got was red, large acne and pimples. i stopped using it and switched to a different cleanser, and my skin healed and cleared all its redness and bumps thanks to switching to something different. but i recently ran out of the cleanser and had to switch back to this for the moment. and not such a surprise, but my acne is back again and i currently have this huge pimple on my forehead that is literally so painful to touch. going to ulta to restock on the cleanser that healed my skin asap. (its the snail rescue purifying cleanser by peach slices. i love it so much!!)

reviews.headline: Very good cleanser
reviews.comments:
This leaves my face clean and super soft. Nice creamy lather and it doesnt irritate my sensitive skin (recently started back on tret). cr

Knocked it down one star because it has an odd (medicinal?) smell to me at first. That smell fades as I lather and doesn't stay on my skin at least.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: This product is amazing for everybody, sensitive skin, acne, prone skin, even kid can use this.

reviews.headline: Horrible!!
reviews.comments: I used this product for a good month and a half and was loving it. I had clear skin when all of a sudden on the 6th week of use my face broke out SOO BAD, red hives all over my face, irritation and swelling. I honestly thought it was an allergic reaction to something i had eaten, until the next morning i washed my face and the same thing happened. Ive discontinued using this cleanser and my face is much happier. Took about a week to fully heal.

reviews.headline: Caused cystic acne
reviews.comments: This wrecked havoc on my skin. I normally don't break out but I immediately started having issues with random cystic acne popping up once I started using this. It was painful and took weeks to heal. I've discontinued using this and have thrown it out.

reviews.headline: So Far So Good!!!
reviews.comments: I have been in the hunt for a good hydrating cleanserâ€¦.I have semi sensitive skin and after I use this cleanser my face feels supple and soft. I bought the entire system and it all works great together.

reviews.headline: This gave me dermatitis around my eyes
reviews.comments: I've never had a reaction to a face wash but this one gave me red peeling skin. Beware if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Acne prone & Sensitive Skin Approved!
reviews.comments: Omg!!! I have the most sensitive and acne prone skin. Its also dry and I suffer from perioral dermatitis. Vanicream is my go to cleanser, but Ive been wanting something more hydrating. This has been the BEST cleanser I have ever used. I've been using it for a month now and theres no irritation or acne. This truly cleans my face AND leaves it so soft. Highly reccomend!

reviews.headline: Acne prone & Sensitive Skin Approved!
reviews.comments: Omg!!! I have the most sensitive and acne prone skin. Its also dry and I suffer from perioral dermatitis. Vanicream is my go to cleanser, but Ive been wanting something more hydrating. This has been the BEST cleanser I have ever used. I've been using it for a month now and theres no irritation or acne. This truly cleans my face AND leaves it so soft. Highly reccomend!

reviews.headline: Safe for dermatitis
reviews.comments: I've been on the hunt for cleansers that are safe for my increasingly sensitive skin, and this has been great, so far. It hasn't bothered my perifacial dermatitis, at all. It also does the job of actually getting my skin clean. I also love how hydrating it is while being oil free. My only caveat is that it does sting a bit if some suds get in my eyes; which has not been an issue with the last couple cleansers that I've used.

rollup.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gentle Foaming Cleanser
